data.actual_result: The typed one shows up fine, but the emoji just sent shows up improperly to desktop users.
data.expected_result: Both messages, typed and emoji, look the same on both ends.
data.short_description: Number emojis aren't sent properly if sent from the Emoji keyboard (typed is fine)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel - Send `:six:` - Confirm it looks normal on desktop - Send the six emoji from the symbols tab on the emoji keyboard
